title: Evidence
description: Evidence attached to a promise for verification in the Soz Ledger protocol.

id.description: Unique identifier for the evidence record.

promise_id.description: The promise this evidence is associated with.

payload.description: Optional structured payload containing the evidence data.

submitted_by.description: Entity ID of the party that submitted the evidence.

verified.description: Whether the evidence has been verified.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the evidence was submitted.

hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the evidence payload for integrity verification.
